IntroText: The pub is pretty empty at this hour.|Nobody from the college is around.
Students gather at the pub after school.|Who would you like to meet?
There you are!  I'm still stuck in|this fucking belt because of you.
Fuck you COMMON_PLAYERNAME!|Unlock that belt now!
Oh!  Miss COMMON_PLAYERNAME!|Can you please unlock the belt now?
There you are!  I'm still stuck in|this fucking egg because of you.
Fuck you COMMON_PLAYERNAME!|Remove the egg now!
Oh!  Miss COMMON_PLAYERNAME!|Can you please remove the egg now?
Hey girl!  If you want to sit here,|you need to bring me a beer.
Hey cutie!  If you want to sit here,|you need to bring me a beer.
Hey fuck face!  If you want to sit|here, you need to bring me a beer.
Hello Miss COMMON_PLAYERNAME.|What brings you to the pub?
Fuck!  Why are you talking to me?
It's great to see you!|Have a beer with me.
I can't believe you took|over the literature class.
I still can't believe you stripped me and|tied me up outside.  I should kick your ass.
Hey there detention-mate.|Are you still causing trouble?
Oh!  It's you.  What do you want?
